4d0ce367-8dbe-4450-bd3d-8fdf87e86a3b.name: Orinoco Pizza
4d0ce367-8dbe-4450-bd3d-8fdf87e86a3b.ingredients: dough, ham, olives, peppers, cheese, mushrooms
4d0ce367-8dbe-4450-bd3d-8fdf87e86a3b.description: Spread the ham equally on the dough, then put some finely chopped olives, peppers and mushrooms. Put in the oven for 30 minutes. Can serve with yoghurt.
